name: Diagnosis
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's diagnosis. To submit multiple diagnoses for a single donor, submit multiple rows in the diagnosis file for this donor.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: submitter_diagnosis_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the diagnosis event, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: diagnosis_ICD_category
fields.description: Disease category as defined in the WHO ICD-10

meta.notes: This refers to the body systems chapters of the WHO ICD-10, https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

fields.name: diagnosis_ICD_term
fields.description: ICD-10 code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: C41.1: Malignant neoplasms of mandible, C16.9: Malignant neoplasm of stomach, unspecified
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in ICD-10 separated by a (:). For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

fields.name: diagnosis_mondo_term
fields.description: Mondo code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: MONDO_0002131: jaw cancer, MONDO_0001056: gastric cancer
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in MONDO separated by a (:). For MONDO codes, refer to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/mondo

fields.name: is_self_reported
fields.description: Indicates whether the information is reported by donor or extracted from (administrative) health records

fields.name: is_cancer
fields.description: The diagnosis is a cancer diagnosis

meta.notes: Basis of diagnosis is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

fields.name: is_cancer_primary
fields.description: Diagnosis is a primary cancer diagnosis

meta.notes: This field is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

fields.name: tumour_staging_system
fields.description: Indicate the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of the diagnosis, prior to treatment

fields.name: clinical_stage_group
fields.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.)

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumour_staging_system

fields.name: t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

fields.name: n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

fields.name: m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.
